data.what_is: Lucep's automated lead qualification system validates numbers, gets leads to confirm their interest, and continues to engage via phone, SMS, email and WhatsApp.
data.product_description: Lucep is a mobile solution that helps businesses increase their online lead generation and conversion.

initial_reviews.review_title: Agile Solution for a Marquee Premium motorcycle Brand in India
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Lucep?
As Strategy Consultant to the largest Premium M/c Brand in India, we presented the solution theme to our client. The team was Lucep was very quick to set the Pilot across 6 cities which was scaled to Pan India. Overall initiative led to at least 40% increase in the high priority digital leads leading to significant impact on both the Topline / bottom line of the client.

What do you dislike about Lucep?
No major downside of the application for the client.

What problems is Lucep solving and how is that benefiting you?
Lucep helped in qualification of the digital leads & then prioritizing them across the identified dealer cohorts to ensure Test Rides leading to booking / closure.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Lucep?
review_question_answers.answer: As Strategy Consultant to the largest Premium M/c Brand in India, we presented the solution theme to our client. The team was Lucep was very quick to set the Pilot across 6 cities which was scaled to Pan India. Overall initiative led to at least 40% increase in the high priority digital leads leading to significant impact on both the Topline / bottom line of the client.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Lucep?
review_question_answers.answer: No major downside of the application for the client.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Lucep solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Lucep helped in qualification of the digital leads & then prioritizing them across the identified dealer cohorts to ensure Test Rides leading to booking / closure.

initial_reviews.review_content:

Lucep is easy to use and very useful for us who collect and communicate with potential students who might enroll in our college.

What do you dislike about Lucep?

What problems is Lucep solving and how is that benefiting you?
Missed chat or calls from potential customer which we can reach back easily with the help of Lucep.

initial_reviews.review_title: Best digital calling app to reach customers for marketing purposes
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Lucep?
Its features when it comes to calling recordings especially, marketing needs, are answered through this tool, and pricing plans are attractive. Generating leads in these times of pandemic is a rel crunch and Lucep is helping a lot

What do you dislike about Lucep?
Sometime it looks a little dim as GUI and interphase need to be worked upon sine agents need to call on this app for long hours

Recommendations to others considering Lucep:
Yes it's a good tool for business calling

What problems is Lucep solving and how is that benefiting you?
Reaching out to potential people when it comes to offer our goods and services since businesses may not reach people in person now a days and sales leads are vital for the survival of the business. Managing records of those calls ensuring that deals are legitimate and could turn into a sale and forwarding the same to sales team has never been that easy

Managing records of those calls ensuring that deals are legitimate and could turn into a sale and forwarding the same to sales team has never been that easy

initial_reviews.review_title: A useful tool for the sales team to achieve maximum results
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Lucep?
The app is user-friendly, and conveniently connects the customer to the business, and vice versa.

What do you dislike about Lucep?
Nothing, really! We haven't come across any issues with the app or support services till now. The app fulfills our requirement when it comes to organized distribution of leads.

What problems is Lucep solving and how is that benefiting you?
For businesses such as ours, Lucep is a brilliant tool that offers superb benefits. Prospective leads, instant responses laced with customized information about the customers helps us strategize our approach to maximize benefits for the customer and us. The app's organized distribution of various kinds of leads makes it convenient for us to plan ahead and offer the best possible options to the customers.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Lucep?
review_question_answers.answer: The app is user-friendly, and conveniently connects the customer to the business, and vice versa.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Lucep?
review_question_answers.answer: Nothing, really! We haven't come across any issues with the app or support services till now. The app fulfills our requirement when it comes to organized distribution of leads.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Lucep solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: For businesses such as ours, Lucep is a brilliant tool that offers superb benefits. Prospective leads, instant responses laced with customized information about the customers helps us strategize our approach to maximize benefits for the customer and us. The app's organized distribution of various kinds of leads makes it convenient for us to plan ahead and offer the best possible options to the customers.

initial_reviews.review_title: Best Website Widget for Sales Team
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Lucep?
Lucep is an Awesome Sales widget to add in your websites, unlike the usual chat box where somebody has to be monitoring it, lucep gets you the details on the go and it is easy to use and integrate. When a lead requests a call, we get analytics-packed alerts and respond back to leads from anywhere instantly.

What do you dislike about Lucep?
So far there is nothing I have disliked in Lucep.

However, it would be great if they can add call recording features in-app, which can be helpful for training purposes.

Recommendations to others considering Lucep:
Go for it, it will greatly decrease the turnaround time for the leads coming through various online portals.

What problems is Lucep solving and how is that benefiting you?
No more wasting a resource to monitor the website visitors.

Connect with the leads instantly.

We can know what was the lead most interested about in our website and pitch to them accordingly.

Very helpful for companies with multiple services, the leads can be sent to the specific salesperson based on the service requested by the lead.

It is like a mini/portable CRM on the mobile for the sales team, we can even leave notes about the leads for the next person who might get in touch with them.

Helps in identifying repeat leads easily and ensure we do not call the same lead multiple times.

When a lead requests a call, we get analytics-packed alerts and respond back to leads from anywhere instantly.

initial_reviews.review_title: Increased in quality of incoming leads
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Lucep?
We are getting enough high quality leads

What do you dislike about Lucep?
I will update the review when I found 1.

Recommendations to others considering Lucep:
If you own a small business  or selling high ticket products or a large company with large workforce can take advantage of this Lucep's click to call widget. Because generating high quality leads is tough if you are not using Lucep's widget.

What problems is Lucep solving and how is that benefiting you?
Contacting the decision makers is, now, easy. That wasn't the case before.

initial_reviews.review_title: A Good Tool Which helps you the connect your Leads
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Lucep?
It helps the user to connect  his customers.
It's very easy and simple so anyone can use it ,With this tool you can connect your customers from anywhere .you just need to add the lucep widget on your website or blog ,and install the lucep app, it instantly notify you on your smartphone when someone tries to call you
One more amazing thing about the tool is  that  it shows you many other details as well like how many times the person scrolled or clicked on a item, It can be very useful for you to know about your customers interest.

What do you dislike about Lucep?
I didn't face any problem with the product yet.

What problems is Lucep solving and how is that benefiting you?
It connects you to your leads
Helps you to get in contact with your clients from anywhere
Helps you to know about your customer's interests
It Analyses lead details for you

initial_reviews.review_title: Awesome sales and lead generation tool
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Lucep?
We were one amongst the earliest to implement Lucep at out company to help generate lead and sales

What do you dislike about Lucep?
Potential users don't know how to use it

What problems is Lucep solving and how is that benefiting you?
Leads and sales generation. We started to get enquiries from day one while some of them were not relevant, we were able to close the 1st sales in 10 days after subscribing to lucep

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Lucep?
review_question_answers.answer: We were one amongst the earliest to implement Lucep at out company to help generate lead and sales

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Lucep?
Lucep is an instant response callback tool that connects your sales team by phone to your website visitors in less than 60 seconds. Copy-paste a few lines of code to install our callback widget on your website. Get your sales team members to download our mobile app, and fully automate lead distribution through the dashboard. Sales team members will now get analytics-packed alerts each time a lead requests a call, and be able to respond back to leads from anywhere in the world - instantly.

What do you dislike about Lucep?
Lucep doesn't have a dedicated WordPress widget/ plugin.

What problems is Lucep solving and how is that benefiting you?
Increase in online conversion rate.
Reach potential clients with a short span of 5 min.
Managing online leads.
Easy to use interface which provides insights into customer dimensions.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Lucep?
review_question_answers.answer: Lucep is an instant response callback tool that connects your sales team by phone to your website visitors in less than 60 seconds. Copy-paste a few lines of code to install our callback widget on your website. Get your sales team members to download our mobile app, and fully automate lead distribution through the dashboard. Sales team members will now get analytics-packed alerts each time a lead requests a call, and be able to respond back to leads from anywhere in the world - instantly.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Lucep?
review_question_answers.answer: Lucep doesn't have a dedicated WordPress widget/ plugin.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Lucep solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer:
Increase in online conversion rate.
Reach potential clients with a short span of 5 min.
Managing online leads.
Easy to use interface which provides insights into customer dimensions.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Lucep?
Lucep is an instant response callback tool that connects your sales team by phone to your website visitors in less than 60 seconds. Copy-paste a few lines of code to install our callback widget on your website. Get your sales team members to download our mobile app, and fully automate lead distribution through the dashboard. Sales team members will now get analytics-packed alerts each time a lead requests a call, and be able to respond back to leads from anywhere in the world - instantly.

What do you dislike about Lucep?
Lucep doesn't have a dedicated WordPress widget/ plugin.

What problems is Lucep solving and how is that benefiting you?
Increase in online conversion rate.
Reach potential clients with a short span of 5 min.
Managing online leads.
Easy to use interface which provides insights into customer dimensions.
